allproducts.title: Alpha Arbutin 02%
allproducts.uses: Reduces Dark Spots, Marks & Evens Skin Tone
allproducts.desc: An anti-pigmentation daily serum with high purity Alpha Arbutin along with Butylresorcinol for dramatically reducing dark spots and blemishes for brighter, even-looking skin.

allproducts.title: Salicylic Acid 02%
allproducts.uses: Reduces Acne, Blackheads & Excessive Oil
allproducts.desc: A daily gentle exfoliant with 2% salicylic acid that wards off acne, blackheads and keeps your oils in check for that flawless matte-looking skin.

allproducts.title: Vitamin C 10%
allproducts.uses: For Brighter, Glowing & Healthy Looking Skin
allproducts.desc: A glow-boosting daily serum packaged with the goodness of Vitamin C & Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) that brightens and tones sun-damaged and dull skin with dark spots.

allproducts.title: SPF 50 Sunscreen
allproducts.uses: Broad Spectrum SPF 50, PA++++
allproducts.desc: A lightweight, moisturizer-meets-sunscreen. This broad spectrum SPF 50 with PA++++ rating has a very light texture that spreads easily & disappears, leaving behind a natural, moisturized, non-shiny look. Loaded with Vitamins A, B, E & F that help repair skin and minimize damage caused by UV exposure.

allproducts.title: Salicylic Acid + LHA 02% Face Cleanser
allproducts.uses: Reduces Sebum & Prevents Breakout Without Drying Skin
allproducts.desc: A daily, gentle exfoliating, acne-fighting face cleanser. It combines BHA + LHA (Salicylic Acid + Capryloyl Salicylic Acid) in 2% concentration, which provides deep cleansing, pore decongestion & sebum reduction without drying out the skin.

allproducts.title: Niacinamide 10%
allproducts.uses: For reducing sebum & pores, and even skin tone
allproducts.desc: A daily serum formulated with pure Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide) and Matmarine. Niacinamide reduces the sebum level of the skin, improves the barrier & evens our skin tone. Matmarine is a perfect biotechnological ingredient to reduce excess sebum, shine, pores & spots.

allproducts.title: Vitamin B5 10% Moisturizer
allproducts.uses: Provides Lightweight Moisturization & Repairs Skin
allproducts.desc: An everyday moisturizer for hydrating, nourishing and repairing skin. A lightweight, oil-free product with high concentration of Vitamin B5 (Panthenol), formulated especially for oily / combination skin.

allproducts.title: Sepicalm 03% Moisturizer
allproducts.uses: Skin Soothing, Lightweight Moisturization
allproducts.desc: A lightweight moisturizer that hydrates, soothes, and softens skin, without oily, shiny or heavy residual feel. Perfect blend of hydrators, emollients and occlusives for all day moisturization. Suitable for Normal, Acne-Prone & Sensitive Skin.

allproducts.title: Hyaluronic + PGA 02%
allproducts.uses: Intense, Multi-Level Hydration without the Oily Feel
allproducts.desc: A hydrating booster with 4 different types of Hyaluronic Acid Molecules along with super hydrator Polyglutamic Acid (PGA). Provides multi-level hydration throughout the day.

allproducts.title: Niacinamide 05%
allproducts.uses: Hydrates, Repairs & Soothes Skin
allproducts.desc: A nourishing & hydrating daily serum that repairs damaged barrier & soothes sensitive skin. Ideal for people with dry, sensitive skin & those who find Niacinamide 10% a little strong.

allproducts.title: AHA PHA BHA 32%
allproducts.uses: Weekend Exfoliator for Instant Glow & Soft Skin
allproducts.desc: A powerful peeling trio of 25% AHA, 5% PHA & 2% BHA that provides multi-level exfoliation, both on the surface & inside the pores, giving you a healthy, plump, and glowing skin.

allproducts.title: Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) 03% Toner
allproducts.uses: Tightens Pores, Exfoliates, Hydrates & Rebalances Skin Microbiome
allproducts.desc: A daily, gentle exfoliating, pH balancing, pore tightening & skin hydrating toner. Boosted with Pre-Biotics and Pro-Biotics to balance skin microbiome and accelerate the recovery of skin's barrier function.

allproducts.title: Retinol 0.3%
allproducts.uses: Powerful Anti-aging Serum for Fine Lines & Wrinkles
allproducts.desc: A highly stable & powerful anti-aging face serum packed with Retinol and antioxidant Coenzyme Q10. This water-free serum keeps Retinol stable & also nourishes skin.

allproducts.title: Tranexamic 03%
allproducts.uses: Reduces Melasma, PIE, PIH & Scars
allproducts.desc: A powerful serum to effectively diminish the appearance of Melasma, PIE, PIH, and hyperpigmentation. With the power of 3% Tranexamic Acid and 1% Hydroxyphenoxy Propionic Acid which inhibits melanin transfer with great efficacy and prevents UVB damage.

allproducts.title: SPF 60 Sunscreen
allproducts.uses: Broad spectrum SPF 60, PA++++
allproducts.desc: An antioxidant-rich SPF, that is light-as-air and provides overall protection from UV through most modern filters. It applies invisibly on all skin tones and does not pill or leave a nasty white cast. It is reef safe and free of OMC, Benzophenone / Oxybenzone, and Homosalate. A broad spectrum SPF 60 with PA++++ rating.

allproducts.title: Granactive Retinoid 02%
allproducts.uses: Help Reduce Fine Lines & Wrinkles
allproducts.desc: Formulated with new-age, bio-available, non-prescription forms of Vitamin-A. Granactive Retinoid decreases the effects of UV induced skin damage and visibly reduces fine lines & wrinkles.

allproducts.title: Vitamin C + E + Ferulic 16%
allproducts.uses: Brightens & protects skin
allproducts.desc: A skin-brightening daily serum with stable Vitamin C at 15% and antioxidants (Vitamin E & Ferulic Acid) at 1% combined.

allproducts.title: Marula Oil 05% Moisturizer
allproducts.uses: Deep & Intense Moisturization. Treats Dryness, Roughness and Flakiness
allproducts.desc: An everyday moisturizing cream with 5% Marula Oil, paired with Vitamin F and Vitamin E to nourish, moisturize and improve skin softness. It's a heavy cream, suitable for dry/damaged to normal skin types.

allproducts.title: Glycolic Acid 08% Exfoliating Liquid
allproducts.uses: Deep Exfoliation For Even Skin Tone, Texture & Glow
allproducts.desc: A multi-purpose exfoliator formulated with Glycolic Acid in free acid form (at 8%) to help in natural cell turnover and effective exfoliation. Combined with bamboo water for hydrating and soothing skin.
allproducts.additionalDesc: Fragrance Free · Silicones Free · Parabens Free • 150ml

allproducts.title: Anti-Acne Kit
allproducts.uses: A powerful routine for treating active acne and soothing skin
allproducts.desc: A Cleanse, Treat, Moisturize combo for clearing acne / blemishes. Salicylic + LHA cleanser gently cleanses & provides multi-level exfoliation, Salicylic Acid serum treats skin overnight and Vitamin B5 moisturizer nourishes & soothes skin.

allproducts.title: Oat Extract 06% Gentle Cleanser
allproducts.uses: Gentle, low-foaming cleanser for damaged, sensitive skin
allproducts.desc: A super mild, gel cream cleanser that removes dirt & excess sebum without damaging barrier function. Oat based mild cleansing agent for soothing & calming irritated & sensitised skin.

allproducts.title: SPF 50 Sunscreen Stick
allproducts.uses: Broad spectrum SPF 50, PA++++
allproducts.desc: A lightweight sunscreen stick that leaves absolutely 0 white cast & no oily feel on application. It’s a photostable sunscreen that is formulated with very effective, new age UV filters to provide protection from UVA & UVB rays. Also contains potent antioxidants that protect & heal skin.

allproducts.title: Multi-Peptides 10%
allproducts.uses: For Firmer, Younger Looking Skin
allproducts.desc: A rejuvenating, collagen boosting serum boosted with peptides that restore youthfulness, resulting in younger, firmer-looking skin.

allproducts.title: AHA BHA 10%
allproducts.uses: Exfoliator for Younger and Glowing Skin
allproducts.desc: A skin-regenerating daily serum with 10% blend of AHAs (Alpha Hydroxy Acids) and BHAs (Beta Hydroxy Acids) that mildly exfoliates without drying the skin to reveal clear, radiant, and hydrated skin.

allproducts.title: L-Ascorbic Acid 08% Lip Treatment Balm
allproducts.uses: Prevents & treats hyperpigmentation, hydrates and softens lips
allproducts.desc: A highly effective lip balm formulation with a combination of biologically active form of Vitamin C, L-Ascorbic Acid along with Radianskin that helps in preventing and reducing hyperpigmentation. Vitamin E and Glycerin hydrate and soften lips.

allproducts.title: Lip Balm SPF 30
allproducts.uses: A nourishing SPF balm that protects, heals and nourishes dry, chapped, and irritated lips
allproducts.desc: An emollient balm formula with new-age, photostable UV filters to provide your lips all day protection from sun. Contains Ceramide & Hyaluronic Acid to hydrate and repair lips.

allproducts.title: Oily Skincare Kit
allproducts.uses: Routine for reducing excess skin oiliness & tightening pores
allproducts.desc: An everyday Cleanse, Treat, Moisturize routine for oily / combination skin. Combination of actives carefully selected for removing & regulating excess sebum, repairing skin and providing oil-free moisturization.

allproducts.title: Aquaporin Booster 05% Cleanser
allproducts.uses: Stimulates hydration & cleans without drying
allproducts.desc: A daily, gentle cleanser with multiple humectants to instantly hydrate and make skin soft & smooth. Formulated at optimum skin-identical pH of 5.5 for cleansing without drying skin.

allproducts.title: Squalane 100%
allproducts.uses: Superior, lightweight Moisturisation
allproducts.desc: A very lightweight moisturiser that naturally seal in moisture and significantly reduces trans-epidermal water loss in cases wherein the skin barrier is disrupted. Non-sticky and non-comedogenic.

allproducts.title: Alpha Lipoic + Glycolic 07% Cleanser
allproducts.uses: For brightening skin tone & evening skin texture
allproducts.desc: An everyday brightening cleanser to give your skin a boost of glow. While ALA brightens skin tone, Glycolic Acid exfoliates to reveal newer, younger skin.

allproducts.title: Ceramides 0.3% + Madecassoside
allproducts.uses: Strengthens Skin Barrier, Hydrates & Soothes
allproducts.desc: An everyday moisturizing gel with 5 Ceramides to restore & repair skin’s natural barrier & prevent water loss. A lightweight formula suitable for oily / combination skin

allproducts.title: Rosehip oil + VC-IP (Vitamin C) 100%
allproducts.uses: Brightens, evens tone & reduces signs of photoaging
allproducts.desc: A pure cold pressed Rosehip oil having high content of essential fatty and unsaturated acids with antioxidant properties. Coupled with 3%  VC-IP (Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate) which is an oil-soluble vitamin C derivative. The combination brightens, repairs skin, fades scars and also reduces signs of photoaging.

allproducts.title: Retinol 0.6%
allproducts.uses: Medium strength Retinol formula for fading fine lines & wrinkles
allproducts.desc: A powerful anti-aging Retinol serum formulated in a stable, water-free system for retaining efficacy of Retinol. Packed with quality ingredients like Coenzyme Q10, Squalane and Rosehip Oil for delivering excellent results.

allproducts.title: Hair Growth Actives 18%
allproducts.uses: Reduces Hairfall & Promotes Healthy Hair Growth
allproducts.desc: A powerful hair growth serum with a blend of 5 proven ingredients (Capixyl, Redensyl, Procapil, Anagain, and Baicapil) in a high concentration of 18%. A potent combination of peptides & extracts for fuller, thicker hair.

allproducts.title: Maleic Bond Repair Complex 05% Hair Serum
allproducts.uses: Repairs and protect hair bonds
allproducts.desc: A pre-shampoo, hair repair serum with our Patent Pending combination of Maleic Acid, Transglutaminase & Amino Acids to repair damaged hair & make them strong. Formulated with Argan Oil, Squalane & Coconut Oil to nourish hair from the inside out and make them soft and healthy.

allproducts.title: Maleic Bond Repair Complex 3.5% Shampoo
allproducts.uses: Repairs and prevents hair damage
allproducts.desc: An everyday Shampoo with Maleic Acid, Transglutaminase & Amino Acids that improves hair strength and makes them healthy & less prone to breakage. A powerful combination of Ceramide, Vitamin E & Vitamin B5 hydrate and nourish hair from within.

allproducts.title: Maleic Bond Repair Complex 05% Hair Mask
allproducts.uses: Repairs and nourishes hair
allproducts.desc: A nourishing hair Mask, with our Patent Pending Combination of Maleic acid, Transglutaminase & Amino Acids. It repairs the damaged hair bonds and makes hair strong & healthy. Additionally, Ceramide III, Wheat Protein, Vitamin E & Vitamin B5 nourish hair, reduce frizz and make them manageable.

allproducts.title: Maleic Bond Repair Complex Shampoo & Mask Duo
allproducts.uses: Repairs, prevent hair damage and nourishes hair
allproducts.desc: A duo of everyday Shampoo and nourishing Mask with our Patent Pending Combination of Maleic Acid, Transglutaminase & Amino Acids that improves hair strength and makes them healthy & less prone to breakage. A powerful combination of Ceramide, Wheat Protein, Vitamin E & Vitamin B5 hydrate, reduce frizz and nourish hair from within.
allproducts.additionalDesc: Sulfate-free • Fragrance free • Essential Oil free

allproducts.title: Vitamin B6 + Carnitine 03% Scalp Serum
allproducts.uses: Regulates Scalp & Hair Oil
allproducts.desc: Our Advanced lightweight, non-greasy formula is designed for those who struggle with an oily scalp. A powerful combination of Vitamin B6 and Carnitine regulates excess sebum so your scalp produces less oil, resulting in a less oily scalp. Boosted with Niacinamide & Zinc to regulate excess sebum and add volume to the hair, while Hyaluronic acid ensures the scalp stays well-hydrated.

allproducts.title: Maleic Bond Repair Complex Serum & Shampoo Duo
allproducts.uses: Repairs, prevent hair damage and nourishes hair
allproducts.desc: A duo of Serum and everyday Shampoo with our Patent Pending Combination of Maleic Acid, Transglutaminase & Amino Acids that improves hair strength and makes them healthy & less prone to breakage. A powerful combination of Ceramide, Vitamin E & Vitamin B5 hydrate, reduce frizz and Argan Oil, Squalane & Coconut Oil nourish hair from within.

allproducts.title: Maleic Bond Repair Complex Trio
allproducts.uses: Repairs, prevent hair damage and nourishes hair
allproducts.desc: A trio of Serum, everyday Shampoo, and Mask with our Patent Pending Combination of Maleic Acid, Transglutaminase & Amino Acids that improves hair strength and makes them healthy & less prone to breakage. A powerful combination of Ceramide, Wheat Protein, Vitamin E & Vitamin B5 hydrate, reduce frizz and Argan Oil, Squalane & Coconut Oil nourish hair from within.

allproducts.title: Niacinamide 05% Body Lotion
allproducts.uses: Keeps skin healthy & hydrated
allproducts.desc: A daily, lightweight, nourishing body lotion infused with Niacinamide, Glycerin & Shea Butter that hydrates, nourishes and repairs skin.

allproducts.title: Glycolic + Tranexamic 11% Body Exfoliator
allproducts.uses: Fades Pigmentation & Sun Tan, Evens Texture
allproducts.desc: A potent body exfoliator that combines the power of acids (AHA & BHA) and proven anti-pigmentation actives (Tranexamic Acid & Butylresorcinol) to provide smooth & even-looking skin.

allproducts.title: Salicylic Acid + LHA 02% Body Wash
allproducts.uses: Gently exfoliates, smoothens skin & reduces body acne
allproducts.desc: A gentle, exfoliating body wash that provides bump-free soft skin without compromising the skin barrier. It contains a powerful combination of Salicylic Acid (BHA) + LHA in a combination of 2% with mild surfactants.

allproducts.title: Nonapeptide + AHA 06% Underarm Roll-On
allproducts.uses: Controls Odour and Fades Underarm Darkness
allproducts.desc: A powerful AHA-infused roll-on that combats odour and fades underarm darkness. This aluminium-free formula inhibits bacterial growth, which keeps your underarms odour-free instead of masking it with fragrance. Nonapeptide-1 inhibits hyperproduction of melanin induced by α-MSH, hence fading underarm darkness & making it even looking.
allproducts.additionalDesc: Fragrance free • Non-Comedogenic • Aluminium free • 40 ml

allproducts.title: SPF 30 Body Lotion
allproducts.uses: Broad Spectrum SPF 30, PA+++
allproducts.desc: A soft cushiony body lotion that not only nourishes skin but also protects from UVA & UVB rays. Lab tested and obtained SPF value of 38.57

hair.additionalDesc: Silicone free • Mineral Oil free • Sulfate-free

hair.title: Maleic Bond Repair Complex Trio
hair.uses: Repairs, prevent hair damage and nourishes hair

bathnbody.title: Niacinamide 05% Body Lotion
bathnbody.desc: A daily, lightweight, nourishing body lotion infused with Niacinamide, Glycerin & Shea Butter that hydrates, nourishes and repairs skin.

bathnbody.title: Glycolic + Tranexamic 11% Body Exfoliator
bathnbody.uses: Fades Pigmentation & Sun Tan, Evens Texture
bathnbody.desc: A potent body exfoliator that combines the power of acids (AHA & BHA) and proven anti-pigmentation actives (Tranexamic Acid & Butylresorcinol) to provide smooth & even-looking skin.

bathnbody.title: Salicylic Acid + LHA 02% Body Wash
bathnbody.uses: Gently exfoliates, smoothens skin & reduces body acne
bathnbody.desc: A gentle, exfoliating body wash that provides bump-free soft skin without compromising the skin barrier. It contains a powerful combination of Salicylic Acid (BHA) + LHA in a combination of 2% with mild surfactants.

bathnbody.title: Nonapeptide + AHA 06% Underarm Roll-On
bathnbody.uses: Controls Odour and Fades Underarm Darkness
bathnbody.desc: A powerful AHA-infused roll-on that combats odour and fades underarm darkness. This aluminium-free formula inhibits bacterial growth, which keeps your underarms odour-free instead of masking it with fragrance. Nonapeptide-1 inhibits hyperproduction of melanin induced by α-MSH, hence fading underarm darkness & making it even looking.
bathnbody.additionalDesc: Fragrance free • Non-Comedogenic • Aluminium free • 40 ml

bathnbody.title: SPF 30 Body Lotion
bathnbody.desc: A soft cushiony body lotion that not only nourishes skin but also protects from UVA & UVB rays. Lab tested and obtained SPF value of 38.57

bathnbody.title: Sun Protection Kit
bathnbody.uses: A powerful kit to protect your skin from UV rays
bathnbody.desc: A combination of sunscreen, body lotion, and lip balm to prevent your skin from sun damage and tanning. Formulated with Photostable & Acne safe ingredients that do not leave any white cast on the application
